button.Name: Halt
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This button will relay to all connected sessions running combat missions to halt after the next mission."]

button.Name: Resume
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This button will relay to all connected sessions running combat missions to resume running, if they were halted using the Halt button."]

Checkbox.name: Halt
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This will halt the bot after it completes the current mission."]

combobox.Name: SRAmmo

Checkbox.name: UseSecondary
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["If you are flying a ship that needs to swap between a short-range, higher damage ammo and a long-range, lower damage ammo, select this option. Make sure you have enough cargo space to fit two times the ammo, AND any mission items you need to loot!"]

combobox.Name: LR AMMO2

Checkbox.name: UseTertiary
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["For when you just need even more range"]

combobox.Name: XLR AMMO2

Text.name: AmmoSupplyTitle
Text.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

Text.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

button.Name: AmmoInc10
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

button.Name: AmmoInc100
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

button.Name: AmmoDec100
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

button.Name: AmmoDec10
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

button.Name: AmmoDec1
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

combobox.Name: MTUType
DrugsToUse
DrugsToUse2

Checkbox.name: UseDrones
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["Check this if you'll be using drones to shoot small shit. This tells the bot to make sure to top off drones before running a mission."]

combobox.Name: DroneType
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This configures the type of drone the bot will top off before a mission."]

listbox.Name: MunitionStorage
listbox.OnSelect: Script[Tehbot].VariableScope.CombatAnoms2.Config:SetMunitionStorage[${This.SelectedItem.Text}] switch ${This.SelectedItem.Text} { case Corporation Hangar UIElement[MunitionStorageFolderTitle@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:Show UIElement[MunitionStorageFolder@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:Show break case Personal Hangar UIElement[MunitionStorageFolderTitle@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:Hide UIElement[MunitionStorageFolder@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:Hide break }
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["Use this field to configure where you would like Tehbot to unload salvage loot."]

Text.name: MunitionStorageFolderTitle

listbox.Name: MunitionStorageFolder
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["This field is used to further configure your dropoff type for types that have additional options, like Corporate Hangars."]

Checkbox.name: DropOffToContainer
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["Check this if you want to unload loot to station container."]

Textentry.Name: DropOffContainerName
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@CombatAnomMainTab@CombatAnomTabs@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2_Frame@Tehbot_CombatAnoms2]:SetText["The bot will unload all the loot from missions to a station container with the specified name."]
